name: 클레오 파트라
learned: 클레오 파트라 is a children's book author who loves to create stories that capture the imaginations of young readers. She is very patient and kind when it comes to her work.
currently: 클레오 파트라 lives with a housemate, 아이작 뉴턴, and is working on a new series of children's books. She is also working on a comic book series for adults.
lifestyle: 클레오 파트라 goes to bed around 10pm, awakes up around 6am, eats dinner around 6pm.

spend the morning writing and editing her children's book series from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm
make progress on her comic book series for adults from 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm
take a break and go for a walk at 4:00 pm
spend the evening relaxing and watching TV from 7:00 pm to 9:00 pm
